Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Central American Minors program was created to bring children fleeing violence in Central America into the United States, as mentioned in the expert's verdict. Falters at times: The claim may falter at times by not providing a clear definition of what constitutes a "minor" in the context of the Central American Minors program.
